医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
正在开发用于男性乳腺癌诊断的突破性治疗工具犹他大学亨茨曼癌症研究所细胞生长和分化核控制项目成员、犹他大学神经科学家、神经生物学和人类遗传学教授 Christopher Gregg 博士被医生诊断为第四期2018年转移性乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Groundwriting-treatment-tool-being-development-for-male-breast-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Groundwriting-treatment-tool-being-development-for-male-breast-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dfa6047-4d44-428b-8490-192a1bae2244 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 21:00:44 -0500 Groundbreaking treatment tool being developed for male breast cancer diagnosis
D-丙氨酸与肾脏糖异生和生物钟有关直到最近，人们才发现氨基酸（蛋白质的组成部分）以两种不同的形式存在：L-形式和D-形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/D-alanine-linked-to-gluconeogenesis-in-the-kidney-and-circadian-clock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/D-alanine-linked-to-gluconeogenesis-in-the-kidney-and-circadian-clock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a29f384e-fbc8-4786-afcf-9fcac02b8b4b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 20:08:49 -0500 D-alanine linked to gluconeogenesis in the kidney and circadian clock
R21/Matrix-M 疫苗获得世卫组织批准在全球推广R21/Matrix-M™疟疾疫苗正式获得世卫组织资格预审资格，有资格被联合国机构采购，距离大规模推广又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/R21Matrix-M-vaccine-gets-WHO-green-light-for-global-rollout.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/R21Matrix-M-vaccine-gets-WHO-green-light-for-global-rollout.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82c78f68-ea5e-4e16-a933-4ff4f8e02e04 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 20:02:09 -0500 R21/Matrix-M vaccine gets WHO green light for global rollout
家庭灰尘化学物质可预测儿童哮喘和过敏全球有数百万儿童患有哮喘和过敏性鼻炎 (AR)，这两种慢性呼吸道疾病严重影响他们的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Home-dust-chemicals-predict-asthma-and-allergies-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Home-dust-chemicals-predict-asthma-and-allergies-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18eeedd6-1f6b-4a87-b1c7-21c0b179b80e Thu, 21 Dec 2023 19:57:07 -0500 Home dust chemicals predict asthma and allergies in children
常春藤皂苷 C 可能是糖尿病肾病的保护措施和新的治疗策略宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。迫切需要开发新颖有效的治疗策略或预防措施来减轻 2 型糖尿病危及生命的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Hederasaponin-C-may-be-a-protective-measure-and-novel-therapeutic-strategy-for-diabetic-nephropathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Hederasaponin-C-may-be-a-protective-measure-and-novel-therapeutic-strategy-for-diabetic-nephropathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=536186b1-a91f-4c33-b5b4-179c28e86e9b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 19:44:44 -0500 Hederasaponin C may be a protective measure and novel therapeutic strategy for diabetic nephropathy
了解初级纤毛、生物钟和伤口愈合之间的联系地球上几乎所有生物体都遵循由细胞时钟基因编码的自然昼夜节律，其作用正如您从名称中猜想的那样：24 小时调节您身体的节律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Understanding-the-link- Between-primary-cilia-biological-clock-and-wound-healing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Understanding-the-link- Between-primary-cilia-biological-clock-and-wound-healing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b726f385-4a14-4061-a79b-51fc0ea1e756 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 19:18:06 -0500 Understanding the link between primary cilia, biological clock and wound healing
检查两种血清生物标志物作为女性认知能力下降的早期预测因子密歇根大学的研究人员将两种血液生物标志物与中年女性认知功能的变化联系起来，为阿尔茨海默病和其他痴呆症的无创、早期检测和干预开辟了一条潜在的强大途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Examining-two-serum-biomarkers-as-early-predictors-of-cognitive-decline-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Examining-two-serum-biomarkers-as-early-predictors-of-cognitive-decline-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a019e2c-61e2-482d-a40f-7ca0bbdead46 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 19:10:33 -0500 Examining two serum biomarkers as early predictors of cognitive decline in women
基底点连接：上皮粘附和河马信号传导的新参与者澳大利亚研究人员发现了一种新的方式，使上皮细胞（在皮肤和胃等器官中形成层）相互附着，以及它们如何感知这些附着处的生长信号，从而帮助它们形成正确大小和形状的组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Basal-spot-junctions-A-new-player-in-上皮-adhesion-and-hippo-signaling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Basal-spot-junctions-A-new-player-in-上皮-adhesion-and-hippo-signaling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=339be11f-2d8d-4809-adaf-360c0463999f Thu, 21 Dec 2023 19:04:53 -0500 Basal spot junctions: A new player in epithelial adhesion and hippo signaling
揭示 JAK 抑制剂在炎症中的微妙作用西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员对 JAK 抑制剂或调节剂在各种细胞类型和组织炎症中的微妙作用有了更深入的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Unraveling-nuanced-roles-of-JAK-inhibitors-in-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Unraveling-nuanced-roles-of-JAK-inhibitors-in-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33980eeb-b085-44f6-abc0-5a7e59878d98 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 18:59:54 -0500 Unraveling nuanced roles of JAK inhibitors in inflammation
低倍窄带成像将胃癌筛查提升到新水平幽门螺杆菌感染被认为是胃癌的重要危险因素。因此，定期筛查以早期发现在患病率高的地区尤其重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Low-magnification-narrow-band-imaging-takes-gastric-cancer-screening-to-the-next-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Low-magnification-narrow-band-imaging-takes-gastric-cancer-screening-to-the-next-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93a968ac-7a19-40c5-aa19-e008d94ad92e Thu, 21 Dec 2023 18:54:40 -0500 Low-magnification narrow-band imaging takes gastric cancer screening to the next level
